name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScanURL.me - FREE to check safety of website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on URL to discover where they actually lead to and get the security risk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScanURL.me is a FREE website security check tool to scan and check the safety of websites. ScanURL.me keeps you safe by checking URLs/links before visiting sites. It protects you from phishing, malware and blacklisted site.
